original_text: But in his estate shall he honour the God of forces: and a god whom his fathers knew not shall he honour with gold, and silver, and with precious stones, and pleasant things.
korean_text: 그 대신에 강한 신을 공경할 것이요 또 그의 조상들이 알지 못하던 신에게 금 은 보석과 보물을 드려 공경할 것이며

sentences.original_text: But in his estate shall he honour
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 통치에서 그는 경배할 것이라

sentences.original_text: and a god whom his fathers knew not
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 조상들이 알지 못하던 신을

sentences.original_text: shall he honour with gold, and silver,
and with precious stones, and pleasant things.
